report.title: My region sites
report.description: Lists regions and the number of species and occurrences within them. This report relies on the record being input with a link to the site and will not pick up records where the spatial reference is in the site boundary but without a direct reference to the site. Optimised for a 2 level sample hierarchy.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations_websites lw JOIN locations l ON l.id=lw.location_id and l.deleted=false JOIN location_attribute_values lav on lav.location_id = l.id AND lav.location_attribute_id = #region_loc_attr_id# AND lav.int_value in (#region_ids#) AND lav.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt on ctt.id=l.location_type_id LEFT JOIN (samples sp JOIN samples s ON s.parent_id=sp.id ) ON sp.location_id=l.id LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_functional o ON o.sample_id = s.id and o.survey_id=s.survey_id and o.website_id in (#website_ids#) #joins# WHERE #website_filter# AND (o.zero_abundance='f' OR o.id IS NULL) AND (CAST(o.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (CAST(l.location_type_id AS character varying)='#location_type_id#' OR '#location_type_id#'='' OR ctt.term='#location_type_id#') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include

param.name: region_loc_attr_id
param.description: ID of the location attribute that hold's a transects region

param.name: region_ids
param.description: Comma separated IDs of the region the regional coordinator is associated with
